title: Michaelmas term the citizens kind welcome to country-men, that from all parts of the land come hither about their needless occasions (needful I mean), with a description of the seasons and manners of the people therein imployed : to the tune of The rambling clerk.
publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, and J. Wright,
notes: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
